paragraphs.body: Roast duck was served by ${link_0} to ${link_1} and ${link_2}.
paragraphs.text: Roast duck was served by Song's mother to Iroh and Zuko.

paragraphs.body: Roast duck is a common ${link_0} eaten by both ${link_1} and ${link_2} citizens. The Fire Nation served it cut into bite-sized pieces, while the Earth Kingdom served it as a whole with a special sauce.
paragraphs.text: Roast duck is a common dish eaten by both Earth Kingdom and Fire Nation citizens. The Fire Nation served it cut into bite-sized pieces, while the Earth Kingdom served it as a whole with a special sauce.

paragraphs.body: While keeping on eye on ${link_0}'s ${link_1}, ${link_2} enjoyed a bowl of roast duck and agreed to teach his nephew some advanced ${link_3} techniques after he finished it.
paragraphs.text: While keeping on eye on Zuko's firebending training, Iroh enjoyed a bowl of roast duck and agreed to teach his nephew some advanced firebending techniques after he finished it.

paragraphs.body: Iroh seemed to savor a real appetite for this dish, as he gladly accepted ${link_0}'s invitation to share a meal at her house after she mentioned that ${link_1} often made roast duck. Having prepared too much, Song's mother handed Iroh some when he and Zuko took their leave again.
paragraphs.text: Iroh seemed to savor a real appetite for this dish, as he gladly accepted Song's invitation to share a meal at her house after she mentioned that her mother often made roast duck. Having prepared too much, Song's mother handed Iroh some when he and Zuko took their leave again.

paragraphs.body: When traveling toward ${link_0} as refugees, Zuko, Iroh, and three ${link_1}, namely ${link_2}, ${link_3}, and ${link_4} enjoyed a bite of roast duck that they stole out of the ${link_5} captain's kitchen.
paragraphs.text: When traveling toward Ba Sing Se as refugees, Zuko, Iroh, and three Freedom Fighters, namely Jet, Smellerbee, and Longshot enjoyed a bite of roast duck that they stole out of the ferry captain's kitchen.
